title: Longdong stream salamander
text: The Longdong stream salamander (Batrachuperus londongensis) is a species of <a href="salamander">salamander</a> in the family <a href="Hynobiidae">Hynobiidae</a> <a href="Endemism">endemic</a> to <a href="Sichuan">Sichuan</a>, <a href="China">China</a>, where it is found in the Longdong River on <a href="Mount%20Emei">Mount Emei</a>. Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a>s are <a href="river">river</a>s and freshwater <a href="spring%20%28hydropshere%29">spring</a>s. It is threatened by <a href="habitat%20loss">habitat loss</a>.
